mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.money/100 AS "money", a.rtype AS "rtype", a.rtype_name AS "rtypename", a.title AS "title", a.identi_id AS "identiid", a.content AS "content", a.receipt_code AS "receiptcode", a.receipt_date AS "receiptdate", a.atime AS "atime", a.post_chajia AS "postchajia", a.is_open as "isopen"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_receipt( id, code, money, rtype, rtype_name, title, identi_id, content, receipt_code, receipt_date, atime, post_chajia, is_open ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{money}, #{rtype}, #{rtypename}, #{title}, #{identiid}, #{content}, #{receiptcode}, #{receiptdate}, #{atime}, #{postchajia}, #{isopen} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_receipt SET code = #{code}, money = #{money}, rtype = #{rtype}, rtype_name = #{rtypename}, title = #{title}, identi_id = #{identiid}, content = #{content}, receipt_code = #{receiptcode}, receipt_date = #{receiptdate}, atime = #{atime}, post_chajia = #{postchajia}, is_open = #{isopen} WHERE id = #{id}
